author: VideoGameLord613
title: Nice car
review: This is just a free car, but there are no minifigures in it. This is a model in Mr. Magorium's big book. This set has transparnet bricks for lights, and red for back lights. Anyway, Having a free car is a good thing.

author: tkettle9719
title: Hummer: Lego Edition
review:
This is among one of the nine sets fearured in the Mr. Magorium Creator value pack. It is a very well made product, and comes at a great price in the combo pack.

Pros

  • -This set is in the right color- black; it just feels right.
  • -The car is instantly recognizable as a Hummer, a quite well made one too.
  • …

Cons

  • -The red bricks feel as though they are in the wrong place, are somewhat awkward.
  • -A license plate over the hinge bar in the front would be a really nice add-on.
  • …

This is a classic example of what all Lego sets should be like- simple, elegant, and similar to real life. This is a great small set that I would recommend to any Lego fan.

author: charliebucket
title: Dad,what's lego?
review:
Box/Instructions

The instructions are nice and the polybag is good.

Parts

I like the trans-2x1 bricks.

Minifigures

There are none!

The build

Is very easy.

The completed model

Looks good.

Overall opinion

A nice little set.
